definition: Huangpu District, Guangzhou/Whampoa (old transliteration)/Guangdong Harbor
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
port/wharf/pier
port/flat land next to a river or ocean
Huangpu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Whampoa Military Academy
Hutchison Whampoa

sentences.english: Be in Guangzhou, black tiger side and the North sea help two great vicious power run amuck at yellow Bu harbor.
sentences.chinese: 在广州，黑虎帮和北海帮两大恶势力横行于黄埔港。

sentences.english: Singapore's Whampoa Road was named in memory of which businessman?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡黄埔路是为了纪念哪一位商人而命名的？

sentences.english: Can you deliver the goods in the end of March if we make Whampoa the port of shipment.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们选择黄埔港，你们能不能在三月底以前交货？

sentences.english: How did you like the night tour on the Huangpu River?
sentences.chinese: 你问对方夜游黄埔江玩得怎么样？

sentences.english: Now Huangpu is fine as the loading port.
sentences.chinese: 现在可以把黄埔定为装运港。

sentences.english: Marketing, the growth of the Chinese people Whampoa Military Academy.
sentences.chinese: 中国营销人成长的黄埔军校。

sentences.english: If I choose Whampoa, will it be possible for you to ship the goods by the end of March?
sentences.chinese: 我选择黄埔港，你们在三月底以前交货吗？

sentences.english: We wish to point out that all orders accepted by us are shipped from Swatow or Whampoa.
sentences.chinese: 我想指出我们接受的所有订货是从汕头或黄埔港发货。

sentences.english: No, Huangpu is fine as the loading port.
sentences.chinese: 现在可以把黄埔定为装运港。

sentences.english: You may choose Tianjin as port of shipment.
sentences.chinese: 现在可以把黄埔定为装运港。

sentences.english: Whampoa and its alumni were the base on which Chiang’s power was built.
sentences.chinese: 黄埔军校以及其校友是蒋介石赖以建立其权力的基石。

sentences.english: Whampoa Garden was located in Hung Hom, South Kowloon, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 黄埔花园是位于香港南九龙红磡区。

sentences.english: Beijing Art Institute of Whampoa University, professor.
sentences.chinese: 北京黄埔大学艺术学院，任教授。

sentences.english: The occurrence and damage of the forestry pests in Huangpu district were intro- duced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了黄埔区林业有害生物的发生和危害情况。

sentences.english: The Huangpu Port, where ocean-going ships can anchor, has navigation lines reaching all continents in the world.
sentences.chinese: 黄埔港可泊远洋海轮，有航线通往世界各大洲。

sentences.english: How about shipping them from Huangpu instead of Shantou?
sentences.chinese: 把汕头改为黄埔交货怎么样？
